About IFOAM - Organics International       Membership Directory
 
 





































 





















Event
Our Seeds, Our Future — Protecting Biodiversity and Farmers' Rights
To mark the International Day of Seeds, we are bringing together a panel of global experts for an insightful discussion on protecting seed sovereignty, resisting corporate influence, and strengthening farmers’ rights.



  
  Register now   











News
Navigating the Impact of the New EU Organic Regulation
On 25 March 2025, we co-hosted a webinar with FiBL, Fairtrade International, and Naturland, drawing over 500 participants eager to explore the challenges and opportunities of the new EU Organic Regulation for smallholder value chains.



  
  Read more   











News
Strengthening African Representation: Rosinah Mbenya Co-opted to the World Board
IFOAM – Organics International has appointed Ms. Rosinah Mbenya, Country Coordinator of PELUM Kenya, to its World Board. Her expertise in agroecology strengthens the organisation’s commitment to inclusive leadership and advancing global organic and sustainable food systems.



  
  Find out more   











Publication 
Global Organic Continues to Grow
The latest figures and the statistical yearbook "The World of Organic Agriculture" have been published for the 26th time this year. In 2023, the global organic farming area increased by 2.5 million hectares, while the sales of organic food reached nearly 136 billion euros.



  
  Read more   











Publication
Elevating Truly Regenerative Agriculture - A Statement from the Organic Movement
The IFOAM - Organics International General Assembly 2024 overwhelmingly approved the statement “Elevating Truly Regenerative Agriculture – Statement from the Organic Movement”. This statement provides members, partners, and regenerative actors with valuable perspectives from the organic movement on current regenerative initiatives and claims.



  
  Read more   











Membership
Join the Organic Movement Today!
When you join IFOAM - Organics International, you join a community of over 800 Affiliates in more than 100 countries.



  
  Learn More   










  chevron_left




  chevron_right
















Together with members in over 100 countries and territories 
as well as regional organisations and sector platforms, 
we are leading change, organically.
